questions.question: Where did you set the name of the JobSummary output port on your Run a Workspace Action?
options: In the Action parameters on the Automations viewing/editing page of FME Server
In the workspace's Automation writer feature type name

questions.question: If your Run a Workspace Action results in the exercise-use-the-automations-writer workspace failing, what output port will receive a message in your Automation?

Add a line to your Log Action Formatted Message Parameter using the output key {user.shapefile}. Trigger the Automation again by uploading an update Shapefile. What does this key add to your Automation log?
options: A link to the source shapefile
A link to download the SpatiaLite database
The path to the Shapefile on FME Server
The path to the Shapefile on your local machine
